flawed_nl_solution:
On the first day, she will do 10 push-ups.
On the second day, she will do 10 + 5 = <<10+5=15>>15 push-ups.
On the third day, she will do 15 + 5 = <<15+5=19>>19 push-ups.
So, Geli will do a total of 10 + 15 + 19 = <<10+15+19=44>>44 push-ups in a week.
#### 44

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 19. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
